TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartConnection extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供讓兩個 控制項建立連接的物件。

span.span: Provides an object that enables two controls to form a connection.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項集合中，連接是連結或兩個關聯（或其他伺服器或使用者） 控制項，讓它們共用資料。In the Web Parts control set, a connection is a link or association between two (or other server or user) controls that enables them to share data. 共用資料的這項功能可讓連接超過隔離控制項所提供之功能的方式使用的控制項。This ability to share data allows connected controls to be used in ways that exceed the functionality offered by the isolated controls. 例如，如果一個控制項提供郵遞區號的資料，而另一個控制項可以讀取該資料，並提供本地天氣資訊根據郵遞區號，然後連接兩個控制項的功能提供更多的值給使用者。For example, if one control provides postal code data, and another control can read that data and provide local weather information based on the postal code, then the connected capability of the two controls provides more value to users. 若要擴充此範例中，其他控制項可以建立同時也會顯示根據郵遞區號，例如本機新聞，連結控制項的資訊和所有郵遞區號資料可以使用這些控制項可以提供單一控制項與都共用資料郵遞區號。To extend this example, other controls could be created that also display information based on a postal code, such as a control with links to local news, and all these controls that can work with postal code data could share data with the single control that provides a postal code. Web 組件的應用程式的一般使用者可以建立和管理所有這類相容控制項直接從 Web 瀏覽器中，使用所提供的標準連接使用者介面 (UI) 之間的連接控制項，或使用所提供的自訂 UI開發人員。End users of Web Parts applications can create and manage connections between all such compatible controls directly from a Web browser, using the standard connections user interface (UI) provided by the control, or using a custom UI provided by a developer. 這類別概觀是一般的基本詳細資料，建立連接的陳述式。This class overview is a general statement of the basic details for creating a connection. 如需特定的元件和需求建立連線所涉及的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件連接概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b)，或請參閱 < 參考類別和程式碼範例所述，在下列的討論。For more on specific components and requirements involved in creating connections, see [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b), or see the reference classes and code examples mentioned in the following discussion. 有數個基本層面 Web 組件連接：There are several fundamental aspects of a Web Parts connection: - 兩個控制項。Two controls. Web 組件中的每個連接是由兩個控制項所組成。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls. 控制項同時參與多個連接可能會但每個單一連接兩個控制項所組成。It is possible for a control to participate in more than one connection simultaneously, but every single connection consists of exactly two controls. 控制項可以直接衍生自基底類別，也可以是其他伺服器控制項，包括 ASP.NET 控制項、 自訂的伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。The controls can derive directly from the base class, or they can be other server controls, including ASP.NET controls, custom server controls, and user controls. 控制項不是衍生自類別，如果放在區域，會自動以包裝物件在執行階段，讓他們能夠繼承自類別和函式做為執行時期控制項。Controls that do not derive from the class, if placed in a zone, are automatically wrapped with a object at run time, which enables them to inherit from the class and function as run-time controls. - 控制項位於區域。Controls residing in zones. 同時控制項和其他的伺服器控制項的類型必須位於能夠參與 Web 組件連接 （及大部分其他 Web 組件的功能） 的區域。Both controls and any other type of server control must reside in a zone to be able to participate in Web Parts connections (and most other Web Parts features). - 消費者和提供者。Consumers and providers. 在每個 Web 組件連接中，有兩個控制項： 資料和資料的取用者的提供者。In every Web Parts connection there are two controls: a provider of data and a consumer of data. 提供者會提供資料給取用者，透過介面的形式，傳回資料的指定的回呼方法。The provider furnishes data to the consumer through a specified callback method that returns data in the form of an interface. （如需如何建立和指定的回呼方法的範例，請參閱本主題的範例 > 一節）。這個回呼方法就是所謂的提供者連接點。(For an example of how to create and specify the callback method, see the Example section of this topic.) This callback method is known as a provider connection point. 此連接點 （其 「 易記 」 名稱、 識別碼和傳回介面的型別） 的詳細資料包含在與提供者控制項相關聯的物件。The details of this connection point (its "friendly" name, an ID, and the type of the returned interface) are contained in a object associated with the provider control. 取用者接收資料，透過指定的方法可接受的介面的執行個體。The consumer receives the data through a specified method that can accept an instance of the interface. 這個方法就所謂的消費者連接點，並連接點 （名稱、 識別碼和介面的型別） 的詳細資料包含在消費者控制項相關聯的物件。This method is known as a consumer connection point, and the details of the connection point (name, ID, and type of interface) are contained in a object associated with the consumer control. - 相容的控制項或有效的轉換程式。Compatible controls or a valid transformer. 工作的連接，消費者和提供者必須是相容 （表示其指定的連接點方法，可以使用相同類型的介面） 或有必須物件能夠轉譯所提供的類型到取用者所了解的型別提供者。For a connection to work, the consumer and provider must either be compatible (meaning that their specified connection point methods can work with the same type of interface), or there must be a object capable of translating the type offered by the provider into a type understood by the consumer. - 物件。A object. 連接存在，必須是執行個體類別，其中包含提供者和消費者的控制項，以及其連接點的詳細資料的參考。For a connection to exist, there must be an instance of the class that contains references to the provider and consumer controls, along with the details of their connection points. 如果提供者和消費者不相容，並改用物件連接，連接參考轉換程式。If the provider and consumer are incompatible and instead use a object to connect, the connection references the transformer. - 建立連接的方式。A means of establishing the connection. 相容的消費者和提供者的控制項有正確的連接點方法來設計及放置在區域中之後, 和物件使用，為最後一個必要的基本步驟來起始連線。After compatible consumer and provider controls have been properly designed with connection point methods and placed in a zone, and a object is available, the last basic step necessary is to initiate the connection. 這種情形的一個方式是讓使用者能夠建立連接，透過 UI。One way this can happen is for users to create the connection through the UI. 如果您將放入``元素在頁面上，以及其他需要連線的元件會適當地在執行階段，使用者可以將頁面切換成連接的顯示模式，按一下 連接動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令的提供者或取用者並連接 UI (根據控制項) 會出現。If you place an `` element on the page, and the other required components for a connection are in place, at run time a user can switch the page into connect display mode, click a connect verb on the verbs menu of either the provider or consumer, and a connection UI (based on the control) will appear. 透過此 UI 中，使用者就會起始連線。Through this UI, the user can initiate the connection. 若要起始的連線的另一個方法是以程式設計的方式。Another way to initiate the connection is to do it programmatically. 在任一情況下，是否透過 UI 或以程式設計的方式，基礎方法，啟動連線是相同的。In either case, whether through the UI or programmatically, the underlying method that initiates the connection is the same. 應用程式會呼叫方法 (或方法，如果使用轉換程式) 上控制傳遞給它來提供者，取用者，以及其各自的連接點物件，而且方法會傳回物件。The application calls the method (or the method if using a transformer) on the control, passing to it the provider, the consumer, and their respective connection point objects, and the method returns a object. 類別會定義封裝之間的連線兩個必要的詳細資訊的物件控制項。The class defines an object that encapsulates the essential details of a connection between two controls. 類別幾乎已完全包含與特定連接的詳細資料相關的屬性。The class consists almost entirely of properties related to the details of a particular connection. 數個屬性的消費者控制項有關中連接。Several properties concern the consumer control in a connection. 屬性會參考在取用者控制項本身，而屬性參考取用者的識別碼。The property references the consumer control itself, and the property references the consumer's ID. 取用者所參考物件，其中包含消費者連接點的詳細資料，屬性。The object, which contains the details of the consumer's connection point, is referenced by the consumer's property. 屬性參考 ID 的物件。The property references the ID of the object. 所有這些取用者相關的連接屬性值必須是指派給它們，以建立連接。All these consumer-related connection properties must have a value assigned to them to create a connection. 類別也有數個與在連接中，提供者控制項相關聯的屬性和這些對應的取用者屬性。The class also has several properties that relate to the provider control in a connection, and these correspond to the properties for a consumer. 屬性會參考在提供者控制項本身，而屬性會參考其識別碼。The property references the provider control itself, while the property references its ID. 屬性參考物件，而內容參照的提供者的連接點識別碼。The property references the object, and the property references the ID of the provider's connection point. 數個屬性有關連接的狀態。Several properties concern the state of the connection. 屬性會指出連接是否作用中 （目前交換資料）] 或 [非作用中 （仍連線，但不是會主動共用的資料）。The property indicates whether the connection is active (currently exchanging data) or inactive (still connected but not actively sharing data). 屬性會指出連接是否共用 （適用於網頁的所有使用者） 或特定使用者連接，而屬性會指出控制項是否靜態 （宣告在網頁標記中，因此永久） 或動態 （以程式設計方式建立，這表示它可以被刪除）。The property indicates whether the connection is a shared (available to all users of a page) or a user-specific connection, and the property indicates whether the control is static (declared in the page markup and thus permanent) or dynamic (created programmatically, meaning that it can be deleted). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立兩個之間的簡單連接控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple connection between two controls. 此範例示範三種方式建立連接： 以宣告方式，透過將連接的標記放在網頁中; 的標記以程式設計的方式，是藉由在程式碼; 建立連線並透過 UI，放入控制項在頁面上，可讓使用者建立的連接。The example demonstrates three ways of forming a connection: declaratively, by placing tags for the connection in the markup of the Web page; programmatically, by creating the connection in code; and through the UI, by placing a control on the page, which enables users to establish a connection. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面和控制項的原始程式碼。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 來源檔案包含一個簡單的介面，名為`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 另外還有名為類別`ZipCodeWebPart`，實作介面，並且會做為提供者控制。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其`ProvideIZipCode`方法是實作介面的唯一成員的回呼方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只會傳回介面的執行個體。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 請注意，方法標示為`ConnectionProvider`中它的中繼資料屬性。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 這是將方法識別提供者的連接點的回呼方法的機制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他類別的名稱為`WeatherWebPart`，並作為連接取用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 這個類別具有名為的方法`GetZipCode`所取得的執行個體`IZipCode`介面從提供者控制。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 請注意，這個方法標示為與取用者的連接點方法`ConnectionConsumer`中它的中繼資料屬性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 頁面頂端附近`Register`使用者控制和自訂指示詞控制項。Near the top are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls. 這個範例假設控制項的動態編譯，因為控制項的原始程式碼應該在 App_Code 子資料夾。`Register`標記中的頁面參考只任意的標記前置詞和命名空間的控制項。Because the example assumes dynamic compilation of the controls, the source code for the controls should be in an App_Code subfolder; the `Register` tag in the page references only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls. 自訂控制項 （提供者和消費者） 宣告的網頁內``元素內，``項目。The custom controls (the provider and consumer) are declared within the Web page's `` element, inside a `` element. 頁面會提供三種方式來建立自訂控制項之間的連接。The page provides three ways to form a connection between the custom controls. 第一個方法是宣告式。The first method is declarative. 在網頁的標記 <`StaticConnections>`項目宣告，並在``項目與做為屬性指定的連接各種消費者和提供者詳細資料。In the markup for the page, a <`StaticConnections>` element is declared, and within that is an `` element, with the various consumer and provider details of the connection specified as attributes. 這是一種方式建立的連接，特別是在宣告直接在網頁上，``項目。This is one way to create a connection, by declaring it directly in the Web page, specifically within the `` element. 這個靜態連接，因為兩個自訂控制項之間的連接會建立立即第一次載入頁面。Because of this static connection, a connection between the two custom controls is created immediately the first time the page loads. 建立控制項之間連接的第二個方法由``網頁中的項目。A second method for forming a connection between the controls is provided by the `` element in the page. 如果使用者在執行階段，切換成連接顯示模式的頁面，按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的自訂控制項，``項目會自動轉譯的 UI 建立連接。If a user switches a page into connect display mode at run time, and clicks a connect verb on one of the custom controls, the `` element automatically renders the UI for creating a connection. 此頁面也會示範建立連線，也就是以程式設計的方式的第三個方法。The page also demonstrates a third way of creating a connection, which is to do it programmatically. 在`Button1_Click`方法的程式碼建立物件提供者的控制項，並擷取其連接點詳細資料，藉由呼叫方法。In the `Button1_Click` method, the code creates a object for the provider control, and retrieves its connection point details by calling the method. 它會執行類似工作取用者控制項，呼叫方法。It carries out a similar task for the consumer control, calling the method. 最後，它會建立新藉由呼叫物件方法控制項。Finally, it creates the new object by calling the method on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Overview/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，第一個連接已經存在，是因為在宣告了``項目。After you load the Web page in a browser, the first connection already exists because it is declared within the `` element. 輸入某些文字**郵遞區號提供者**控制項，以及它將會顯示在取用者控制。Enter some text in the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and it will be displayed in the consumer control. 接下來，中斷連接兩個控制項。Next, disconnect the two controls. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，變更頁面可連接的顯示模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to connect display mode. 按一下每個 （由標題列中的向下箭號表示） 的動詞命令功能表控制項，並請注意，每個有**連接**選項。Click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar) for each of the controls, and notice that each has a **Connect** option. 這是連接的動詞命令，它會出現在動詞命令功能表只當頁面是在連接模式。This is a connect verb, which appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in connect mode. 按一下其中一個控制項，以及連接 UI 所提供的連接動詞命令控制項就會出現。Click the connect verb on one of the controls, and the connection UI provided by the control appears. 按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕以結束控制項之間的靜態連接。Click the **Disconnect** button to end the static connection between the controls. 使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的控制項。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 請嘗試一些新的文字提供者中再次輸入，並記下的控制項已中斷連接，因為更新在消費者控制項失敗文字。Try to enter some new text in the provider again, and note that because the controls are disconnected, the text fails to update in the consumer control. 接下來，使用與上面相同的方法，將頁面切換成連接顯示模式。Next, use the same method as above to switch the page into connect display mode again. 按一下控制項的其中一個連接動詞命令。Click a connect verb on one of the controls. 按一下**建立連接**連結，並使用所提供的 UI控制項來建立控制項之間的連接。Click the **Create a Connection** link, and use the UI provided by the control to create a connection between the controls. 這是建立連接的第二個方法。This is the second method for creating a connection. 請注意，一旦形成連接時，最後一個字串您輸入的提供者控制項 （未出現，因為控制項已中斷連線） 中突然出現在取用者，因為已經重新建立連線。Note that as soon as the connection is formed, the last string you entered in the provider control (that failed to appear because the controls were disconnected) suddenly appears in the consumer, because the connection has been recreated. 按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕以結束目前您剛才建立的連接。Click the **Disconnect** button to end the current connection that you just created. 傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Return the page to browse mode. 輸入要示範文字未更新，以及控制項再次中斷連線的提供者中的一些新文字。Enter some new text in the provider to demonstrate that the text is not updated, and that the controls are again disconnected. 傳回頁面可連接的顯示模式。Return the page to connect display mode. 除了按一下連接的動詞命令，請按一下**連接 web 組件控制項**按鈕，以說明建立連接的第三個方法。Instead of clicking a connect verb, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, which illustrates the third method of forming a connection. 這種方式連接以程式設計方式在一個簡單的步驟中的控制項，而不需要使用控制項。This approach connects the controls programmatically in one simple step without having to use the control. 請注意，建立連接時，取用者控制項中顯示您突然輸入提供者中的最後一個字串。Note that as the connection is created, the last string you entered in the provider suddenly appears in the consumer control.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是公用的以便在網頁標記中宣告的連線時，ASP.NET 剖析器可以建立執行個體，這個建構函式不是以用於開發人員程式碼。The constructor is public so that the ASP.NET parser can create an instance when a connection is declared in the markup of a Web page; this constructor is not intended to be used in developer code. 當您想要建立物件以程式設計的方式，您應該使用或方法中提供控制項。When you want to create a object programmatically, you should use the or the method provided in the control. 這些方法會處理許多詳細資料，建立連接，然後傳回物件。These methods handle the many details of creating a connection, and return a object. 建構函式類別設定的值和屬性`true`。The constructor for the class sets the values of the and properties to `true`. 因此新的連接的預設狀態將是靜態的 （表示它在包含網頁的標記中宣告），並且共用 （[] 頁面上的所有使用者可看見）。Thus the default state of a new connection is to be static (meaning that it is declared in the markup of the containing Web page) and shared (visible to all users of the page). 當您藉由宣告的頁面中標記的連線新增在典型的案例中，連線就會發生的情況``項目。This will be the case when you add a connection in the typical scenario, by declaring the connection in the markup of the page with an `` element. 不過，在其他情況下連接將會有不同的值，這些屬性。However, in other circumstances a connection will have different values for these properties. 例如，當您新增連線以程式設計方式所建立的連接物件中的程式碼，且使用者在檢視頁面的預設使用者個人化範圍中，連接會建立為動態的每個-user(visible only to the specific user)連接。For example, when you add a connection programmatically by creating the connection object in code, and the user is viewing the page in the default user personalization scope, the connection is created as a dynamic, per-user(visible only to the specific user) connection. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性是唯讀的並會在內部設定這些屬性，判斷連接的性質控制項根據建立連接的方式 (以宣告方式在網頁標記中，或以程式設計方式透過您的程式碼或使用者介面）。The and properties are read-only, and these properties that determine the nature of a connection are set internally by the control depending on how a connection is created (declaratively in the page markup, or programmatically through your code or the user interface).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Consumer As WebPart

summary.span: 取得做為連接之中消費者控制項的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that is acting as the consumer control in a connection.

value.span: ，表示做為連接之中消費者的 Web 組件控制項。

span.span: A that represents the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件中的每個連接是由兩個共用資料的控制項所組成。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls that share data. 一個控制項可當做資料提供者，並另一個控制項做為消費者接收和處理來自提供者的資料。One control acts as the provider of data, and the other control acts as a consumer, receiving and processing the data from the provider. 屬性取得的參考控制做為連線關聯性中的取用者。The property gets a reference to the control acting as a consumer in a connection relationship. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個的原始程式碼做為取用者和連接和連接點使用介面的提供者的控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁，裝載控制項，並示範如何使用程式碼屬性。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 接近頁面頂端會`Register`使用者控制項的自訂控制項的指示詞。Near the top of the page are the `Register` directives for the user control and the custom controls. 這個範例會使用動態編譯，因為`Register`參考組件名稱不需要對原始程式檔的指示詞; 它包含只任意的標記前置詞和命名空間的控制項。Because this example uses dynamic compilation, the `Register` directive for the source file does not need to reference an assembly name; it includes only an arbitrary tag prefix and the namespace of the controls. 在`Button2_Click`方法，程式碼存取的連接物件，透過控制項，然後取得消費者控制項的參考。In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the connection object through the control, and gets a reference to the consumer control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Consumer/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請使用**顯示模式**切換頁面，即可連接模式下的下拉式清單控制項。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用**連接 web 組件控制項** 按鈕或提供的連接使用者介面 (UI)，建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection user interface (UI), to create a connection between the two controls. 按一下**顯示取用者資訊** 按鈕以執行程式碼，示範屬性。Click the **Display Consumer Info** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

summary.span: 取得做為連接之中消費者控制項連接點的物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中一個所需的步驟建立兩個連接的控制項為建立每個控制項的連接點。One of the required steps for creating a connection between two controls is to create connection points for each control. 消費者連接點是包含有關如何連接至控制項作為消費者之資訊的物件。The consumer connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a consumer. 取用者在原始程式碼中，其中一種方法必須用來識別`ConnectionConsumer`屬性。In the consumer's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute. 消費者控制項相關聯的物件包含方法和屬性，包括識別碼方法，在使用者介面 (UI) 中使用的顯示名稱詳細資料，哪種類型的介面方法進行擷取。The object that is associated with a consumer control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface the method can retrieve. 這組取用者的相關資訊，其方法來建立連接和其了解，介面的型別共同形成消費者連接點。This set of information about the consumer, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it understands, collectively forms a consumer connection point. 根據預設，物件可以連接到一個物件一次。By default, a object can connect to only one object at a time. 消費者可以有多個方法識別為可能的消費者連接點，但取用者只能參與一個連接取用者 （因此，只有一個取用者連接點可以是現用） 一次。A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time. 相反地，可以連接到任何數目的物件。In contrast, a can connect to any number of objects. 可以變更此預設行為，藉由覆寫屬性屬性。This default behavior can be changed by overriding the property on the attribute. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個的原始程式碼做為取用者和連接和連接點使用介面的提供者的控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁，裝載控制項，並示範如何使用程式碼屬性。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 在`Button1_Click`方法，建立連接所需的所有物件會都建立，包括物件。In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a object. 這些物件會傳遞至方法來建立連接。These objects are all passed to the method to create the connection. 在`Button2_Click`方法時，程式碼存取屬性，並顯示某些的連接點的詳細資料。In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property and displays some details of the connection point. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPoint/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請使用**顯示模式**切換頁面，即可連接模式下的下拉式清單控制項。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用**連接 web 組件控制項** 按鈕或提供的連接 UI，以建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls. 按一下**ConnectionPoint 詳細資料** 按鈕以執行程式碼，示範屬性。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConsumerConnectionPointID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定連接上的屬性值，這個屬性會參考做為此連接之消費者連接點的物件 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the consumer connection point for that connection.

value.span: 字串，包含消費者連接點的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於靜態網頁標記中宣告的連線，開發人員可以指定連接所指派值給使用哪些消費者連接點`ConsumerConnectionPointID`屬性``項目。For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which consumer connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute on the `` element. 如果不指定給屬性的值使用屬性值。If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the property value is used. 當您建立動態 （以程式設計方式） 的連接時，通常您不應該設定值的屬性。When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the property. 您可以直接呼叫方法控制項，將傳遞至它的取用者和消費者連接點物件 （以及其他必要的參數），以及該方法會判斷要用於消費者連接的正確識別碼點。You can simply call the method on the control, passing to it the consumer and consumer connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the consumer's connection point. 同樣地，當您中斷連線，您可以呼叫方法，而不需要指定屬性值。Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the method without needing to specify the property value. > [!NOTE] > 當您指定時，您可以判斷消費者連接點識別碼或其他伺服器控制項，取用者。The ID of a consumer's connection point can be determined when you designate a or other server control as a consumer. 您必須識別取用者的擷取執行個體的提供者控制或轉換程式所提供的介面中的方法。You must identify a method in the consumer that retrieves an instance of an interface furnished by either a provider control or a transformer. 若要識別的方法，將它與標示`ConnectionConsumer`code 屬性。To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionConsumer` code attribute. 當您加入此屬性時，您可以加入做為識別碼，取用者的選擇性字串值參數物件。When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the consumer's object. 如果您提供選擇性的 ID 參數的值，該值會成為的值連接屬性。If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the property for the connection. 如果您未提供的識別碼值、使用屬性值。If you do not supply an ID value, the property value is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式和以程式設計方式使用的屬性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，連接宣告在網頁標記中，使用``和``項目。Note that a connection is declared in the page markup, using the `` and `` elements. 包含所需的連接宣告`ConsumerConnectionPointID`屬性。The connection declaration includes the required `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute. 建立連接的第二個方法會出現在`Button1_Click`方法，其中的程式碼會建立新的連接，並使用在取用者控制項中定義的連接點。A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point defined in the consumer control. 然後，在`Button2_Click`方法時，程式碼存取屬性。Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ConsumerConnectionPointID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，連接已存在由於網頁中宣告的靜態連接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意它會顯示在取用者，因為連線。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下來，中斷連接控制項。Next, disconnect the controls. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，將頁面切換至連接模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕。Click the **Disconnect** button. 使用**連接 web 組件控制項**按鈕來重新建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 按一下**ConnectionPoint 詳細資料**按鈕執行的程式碼存取屬性值。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value. 在控制項下方的標籤中，值會寫出。The value is written out in a label below the controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConsumerID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定連接上的屬性值，這個屬性會參考做為此連接之消費者 控制項的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the control acting as a consumer for that connection.

value.span: 字串，包含做為連接之中消費者控制項的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control acting as a consumer in a connection.

A string that contains the ID of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個物件具有唯一的值指派給其屬性。Every object has a unique value assigned to its property. 這是為了確保能夠區別多個連接。This is to ensure that there is a way to distinguish between multiple connections. 如果您藉由宣告建立靜態連接``元素在網頁上，而且您不會指派值給`ID`屬性進行連接，發生例外狀況時擲回控制項嘗試啟動連線。If you create a static connection by declaring an `` element in a Web page, and you do not assign a value to the `ID` attribute for the connection, an exception is thrown when the control attempts to activate the connection. 當控制項建立新的動態連接，它會呼叫方法來產生連線的唯一識別碼。When the control creates a new dynamic connection, it calls the method to generate a unique ID for the connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式和以程式設計方式使用的屬性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，連接已存在由於網頁中宣告的靜態連接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意它會顯示在取用者，因為連線。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下來，中斷連接控制項。Next, disconnect the controls. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，將頁面切換至連接模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕。Click the **Disconnect** button. 使用**連接 web 組件控制項**按鈕來重新建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 按一下**連接詳細資料**按鈕執行的程式碼存取屬性值。Click the **Connection Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value.

public: property bool IsActive { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得指出目前是否已建立 物件，並且其提供者和消費者控制項之間是否可以交換資料的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a object is currently established and able to exchange data between its provider and consumer controls.

value.span: 如果連接在作用中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the connection is active; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性指示的狀態為物件。The property indicates a state of a object. 在連接中的提供者和消費者控制項處於此狀態的連線時，會通訊，以及是否可以透過通用介面交換資料或物件。When the connection is in this state, the provider and consumer controls in the connection are communicating and able to exchange data through a common interface or a object. 當使用者檢視轉譯的頁面，其中包含一般的瀏覽模式中建立的連接時，連接是使用中 （除非它無法載入頁面時，因為某些衝突或其他問題啟動）。When a user views a rendered page that includes an established connection in normal browse mode, the connection is typically active (unless it failed to be activated due to some conflict or other issue when the page loaded). 在網頁和控制項的生命週期的早期階段，屬性值是`false`。In the early stages of the page and control life cycle, the property value is `false`. 連接啟動之後事件控制項，就會引發。The connection is activated just after the event on the control is raised. 具體而言，連接後，會啟用取用者從提供者擷取指定之介面的執行個體或物件。Specifically, the connection is activated after the consumer has retrieved an instance of the specified interface from the provider or a object. 它是很有幫助是否作用中的情況下連接其中可能有衝突或同步處理的問題，因為多個頁面上的連接。It is useful to know whether a connection is active in situations where there might be conflicts or synchronization issues due to multiple connections on a page. 例如，如果有兩個連接，發生衝突的某種控制項具有未啟動其中一個連接的選項，以避免衝突。For example, if there is some kind of conflict between two connections, the control has the option of not activating one of the connections to avoid the conflict. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 此範例包含三個部分：The example has three parts: - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsActive/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 最上方是`Register`指的是兩個動態編譯的程式碼的指示詞控制項。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 在宣告靜態連接了``頁面上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. 內`

summary.span: 取得值，指出 物件對所有使用者或只對目前使用者為可見。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a object is visible to all users or only to the current user.

value.span: 如果連接是共用的，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the connection is shared; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同個別控制項物件可以是共用或每個使用者執行個體。As with individual controls, a object can be a shared or a per-user instance. 共用執行個體表示連線的網頁，所有使用者可見，且每個使用者執行個體表示的連線是只對特定使用者可見的。A shared instance means that the connection is visible to all users of a Web page, and a per-user instance means the connection is visible only to a specific user. 一般情況下，連接會加入至頁面的方式會決定是否為共用連接。In general, the way a connection is added to a page determines whether the connection is shared. 如果連接在網頁標記中宣告，則連線共用和屬性值是`true`。If the connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, then the connection is shared and the property value is `true`. 此外，如果網頁被共用的個人化範圍中時加入連接，連接也被共用。In addition, if the Web page is in shared personalization scope when a connection is added, the connection is also shared. 一般而言，當使用者使用``新增連線時，頁面使用者介面 (UI) 是使用者個人化範圍，因此不會共用連線和屬性值是`false`。Typically, when a user uses the `` user interface (UI) to add a connection, the page is in user personalization scope, so the connection is not shared and the property value is `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 程式碼範例包含五個部分：The code example has five parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 將 Web.config 檔案中，才能執行此範例中的項目。An entry in the Web.config file that is required to run the example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsShared/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). example to be able to edit the page in shared personalization scope. 若要啟用此功能，您必須擁有項目中的 Web.config 檔案``區段，如下列範例所示。To enable this, you must have an entry in the Web.config file within the `` section that looks like the following example. ``` ``` 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項以將頁面切換至連接的顯示模式。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect display mode. 按一下**連接 web 組件控制項**按鈕來建立連接。Click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form a connection. 接下來，按一下**連接詳細資料** 按鈕以顯示連接是否為共用。Next, click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared. 如果您建立連線預設使用者個人化範圍中的網頁屬性值應為`false`連接。If you created the connection with the page in the default user personalization scope, the property value should be `false` for the connection. 其中一個的動詞命令功能表控制項 （由標題列中的向下箭頭），按一下 連接的動詞命令。On the verbs menu of one of the controls (indicated by the downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 連接 UI 出現時，按一下**中斷連線**按鈕以結束連接。When the connection UI appears, click the **Disconnect** button to end the connection. 使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的控制項。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 在**顯示模式**控制項中，選取**共用**選項可將頁面切換成共用個人化範圍。In the **Display Mode** control, select the **Shared** option to switch the page into shared personalization scope. 遵循相同的步驟來建立連線，再次按一下上述**連接詳細資料** 按鈕以顯示連接是否為共用。Follow the same steps as those above to create a connection, and again click the **Connection Details** button to display whether the connection is shared. 在此情況下，值屬性應該是`true`。In this case, the value of the property should be `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件控制項之間的連接可以是靜態或動態。Connections between Web Parts controls can be either static or dynamic. 在網頁標記中宣告靜態連接使用``項目。A static connection is declared in the markup of a Web page, using an `` element. 以程式設計方式建立動態的連接，或當使用者建立的連接，透過使用者介面 (UI) 所定義控制項。Dynamic connections are created programmatically or when a user creates a connection through the user interface (UI) defined by the control. 靜態連接是共用的物件，表示它們為網頁上的所有使用者使用。Static connections are shared objects, meaning they are available to all users of the Web page. 此外，它們是永久基本上，因為要靜態控制項，它們不會永久刪除。Also, they are essentially permanent because, like a static control, they cannot be permanently deleted. > [!NOTE] > 靜態連接物件不會永久刪除，而它可以是永久中斷連線。While a static connection object cannot be permanently deleted, it can be permanently disconnected. 在此情況下，中斷連接的物件不會在伺服器上，有存在，但在終端使用者永遠不會察覺在網頁中的物件存在。In this case, the disconnected object would exist on the server, but an end user would never be aware of the object's existence in a page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 主控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 最上方是`Register`指的是兩個動態編譯的程式碼的指示詞控制項。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 在宣告靜態連接了``頁面上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `Button1_Click`方法存取檢查連接是否為靜態屬性。The `Button1_Click` method accesses the property to check whether the connection is static. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/CS/wpConnectIsStaticCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_IsStatic/VB/wpConnectIsStaticVB.aspx#1)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 已建立靜態連接。The static connection is already created. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意的文字會顯示在消費者控制項。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 按一下**連接詳細資料**按鈕顯示的值屬性。Click the **Connection Details** button to display the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Provider As WebPart

summary.span: 取得做為 Web 組件連接之中提供者的 控制項。

span.span: Gets a control that acts as the provider in a Web Parts connection.
A that acts as the provider of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件中的每個連接都包含兩個控制項消費者和提供者--和屬性會傳回連接的提供者控制項的參考。Every Web Parts connection consists of two controls--a consumer and a provider--and the property returns a reference to the provider control in a connection. 連接 （取用者控制項） 中其對應項目，例如提供者控制項，才能建立連接。Like its counterpart in a connection (the consumer control), the provider control is required to establish a connection. 不論您是以程式設計的方式，或藉由宣告頁面持續性格式建立連接，您必須指定做為連接的提供者的控制項。Whether you create the connection programmatically, or by declaring it in page persistence format, you must specify a control to act as the provider for a connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 主控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 最上方是`Register`指的是兩個動態編譯的程式碼的指示詞控制項。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 在宣告靜態連接了``頁面上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. 請注意，在``項目，`ProviderID`屬性已指派給它的提供者控制項的 ID。Notice that in the `` element, the `ProviderID` attribute has the ID of the provider control assigned to it. 這是識別所需的靜態連接的提供者。This is required to identify the provider for the static connection. `Button1_Click`方法存取屬性，並將其詳細資料部份寫入到某個標籤。The `Button1_Click` method accesses the property and writes some of its details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/CS/wpConnectProviderCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_Provider/VB/wpConnectProviderVB.aspx#1)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 已建立靜態連接。The static connection is already created. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意的文字會顯示在消費者控制項。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 按一下**提供者詳細資料** 按鈕以顯示透過存取的屬性值的某些屬性。Click the **Provider Details** button to display some of the property values accessed through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderConnectionPoint As ProviderConnectionPoint

summary.span: 取得做為連接之提供者 控制項連接點的物件。

span.span: Gets the object that serves as a connection point for a control acting as a provider for a connection.

value.span: 與連接之中提供者控制項關聯的 。

span.span: A associated with the provider control in a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其中一個所需的步驟建立兩個連接的控制項為建立每個控制項的連接點。One of the required steps for creating a connection between two controls is to create connection points for each control. 提供者連接點是包含如何連接至做為提供者控制資訊的物件。The provider connection point is an object that contains the information about how to connect to the control acting as a provider. 提供者在原始程式碼中，其中一種方法必須用來識別`ConnectionProvider`屬性。In the provider's source code, one of the methods must be identified with the `ConnectionProvider` attribute. 也就是相關聯的提供者與控制項包含方法和屬性，包括識別碼方法，在使用者介面 (UI) 中使用的顯示名稱的詳細和哪種類型的介面執行個體方法可以傳回給取用者控制項。The that is associated with a provider control contains details about the method and the attribute, including an ID for the method, a display name for use in the user interface (UI), and what type of interface instance the method can return to a consumer control. 這組提供者的相關資訊，其方法來建立連線，並提供的介面的型別共同形成提供者連接點。This set of information about the provider, its method for forming connections, and the type of interface it provides, collectively forms a provider connection point. 根據預設，可以連接到一個物件一次。By default, a can connect to only one object at a time. 消費者可以有多個方法識別為可能的消費者連接點，但取用者只能參與一個連接取用者 （因此，只有一個取用者連接點可以是現用） 一次。A consumer could have multiple methods identified as possible consumer connection points, but a consumer can only participate in one connection as a consumer (hence, only one of its consumer connection points can be active) at a time. 相反地，可以連接到任何數目的預設物件。In contrast, a can connect to any number of objects by default. 例如，提供者提供的控制項，郵遞區號無法連接到多個取用者控制項用來建立各種類型的資料是根據郵遞區號，例如天氣資料、 新聞等等的郵遞區號。For example, a provider control that provides a postal code could be connected to multiple consumer controls that use a postal code to create various kinds of data based on a postal code, such as weather data, news, and so on. 可以變更此預設行為，藉由覆寫屬性屬性。This default behavior can be changed by overriding the property on the attribute. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個的原始程式碼做為取用者和連接和連接點使用介面的提供者的控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two controls that serve as the consumer and the provider for the connection, and an interface used for the connection points. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁，裝載控制項，並示範如何使用程式碼屬性。The third part of the code example is the code for the Web page that hosts the controls and demonstrates the use of the property. 在`Button1_Click`方法，建立連接所需的所有物件會都建立，包括物件。In the `Button1_Click` method, all the objects required to form a connection are created, including a object. 請注意呼叫方法控制項。Note the call to the method on the control. 建立不同的物件會傳遞至方法來建立連接。The various created objects are all passed to the method to create the connection. 在`Button2_Click`方法時，程式碼存取屬性，並顯示某些的連接點的詳細資料。In the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property and displays some details of the connection point. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPoint/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請使用**顯示模式**切換頁面，即可連接模式下的下拉式清單控制項。After you load the page in a browser, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 使用**連接 web 組件控制項** 按鈕或提供的連接 UI，以建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button, or the provided connection UI, to create a connection between the two controls. 按一下**ConnectionPoint 詳細資料** 按鈕以執行程式碼，示範屬性。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that demonstrates the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderConnectionPointID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定連接上的屬性值，這個屬性會參考做為此連接之提供者連接點的物件 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the object serving as the provider connection point for that connection.

value.span: 字串，包含提供者連接點物件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID for a provider connection point object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於靜態網頁標記中宣告的連線，開發人員可以指定連接所指派值給使用的提供者連接點`ProviderConnectionPointID`屬性``項目。For a static connection declared in the markup of a Web page, developers can specify which provider connection point will be used for the connection by assigning a value to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute on the `` element. 如果不指定給屬性的值使用屬性值。If a value is not assigned to the attribute, the property value is used. 當您建立動態 （以程式設計方式） 的連接時，通常您不應該設定值的屬性。When you create dynamic (programmatic) connections, normally you should not set the value of the property. 您可以直接呼叫方法控制項，將傳遞至它的提供者和提供者連接點物件 （以及其他必要的參數），以及該方法會判斷要使用的提供者連線的正確識別碼點。You can simply call the method on the control, passing to it the provider and provider connection point objects (along with the other required parameters), and that method determines the correct ID to use for the provider's connection point. 同樣地，當您中斷連線，您可以呼叫方法，而不需要指定屬性值。Similarly, when you disconnect, you can call the method without needing to specify the property value. > [!NOTE] > 您可以判斷提供者的連接點的識別碼，當您指定或其他伺服器控制項，做為提供者。The ID of a provider's connection point can be determined when you designate a or other server control as a provider. 您必須識別提供者可包含資料的取用者介面的執行個體中的回呼方法。You must identify a callback method in the provider that serves an instance of an interface containing data to a consumer. 若要識別的方法，將它與標示`ConnectionProvider`code 屬性。To identify the method, mark it with the `ConnectionProvider` code attribute. 當您加入此屬性時，您可以加入做為 ID 提供者的選擇性字串值參數物件。When you add this attribute, you can add an optional string value parameter that serves as an ID for the provider's object. 如果您提供選擇性的 ID 參數的值，該值會成為的值連接屬性。If you supply a value for the optional ID parameter, that value becomes the value of the property for the connection. 如果您未提供的識別碼值、控制在建立物件時，會將指派預設識別碼。If you do not supply an ID value, the control assigns a default ID when the object is created. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式和以程式設計方式使用的屬性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，連接宣告在網頁標記中，使用``和``項目。Note that a connection is declared in the page markup, using the `` and `` elements. 包含所需的連接宣告`ProviderConnectionPointID`屬性。The connection declaration includes the required `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute. 建立連接的第二個方法會出現在`Button1_Click`方法，在程式碼會建立新的連接，其中使用的連接點 （與識別碼） 之提供者控制項中定義。A second method for creating the connection appears in the `Button1_Click` method, where the code creates a new connection, using the connection point (and the ID) defined in the provider control. 然後，在`Button2_Click`方法時，程式碼存取屬性。Then, in the `Button2_Click` method, the code accesses the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderConnectionPointID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，連接已存在由於網頁中宣告的靜態連接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意它會顯示在取用者，因為連線。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下來，中斷連接控制項。Next, disconnect the controls. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，將頁面切換至連接模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕。Click the **Disconnect** button. 使用**連接 web 組件控制項**按鈕來重新建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 按一下**ConnectionPoint 詳細資料**按鈕執行的程式碼存取屬性值。Click the **ConnectionPoint Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value. 在控制項下方的標籤中，值會寫出。The value is written out in a label below the controls.

summary.span: 取得或設定連接上的屬性值，這個屬性會參考做為此連接之提供者 控制項的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the property value on a connection that references the ID of the control acting as a provider for that connection.

value.span: 包含提供者控制項 ID 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the provider control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值時，需要您建立兩個連接控制項。The property value is required when you create a connection between two controls. 如果值不指派給屬性，例外狀況時擲回控制項嘗試啟動連線。If a value is not assigned to the property, an exception is thrown when the control attempts to activate the connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式和以程式設計方式使用的屬性。The following code example shows the declarative and programmatic use of the property. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件 頁面上顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 裝載的所有控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 將下列來源的程式碼儲存至.ascx 檔案中，指派給檔案名稱`Src`屬性`Register`指示詞的這個使用者控制項，這是主控網頁頂端附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ProviderID/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，連接已存在由於網頁中宣告的靜態連接。After you load the page in a browser, a connection already exists because of the static connection declared in the page. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意它會顯示在取用者，因為連線。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that it is displayed in the consumer due to the connection. 接下來，中斷連接控制項。Next, disconnect the controls. 若要這樣做，請使用**顯示模式**切換頁面，即可連接模式下的下拉式清單控制項。To do that, use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to connect mode. 按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示） 上的其中一個控制項，並按一下連接的動詞命令。Click the verbs menu (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar) on one of the controls, and click the connect verb. 按一下**中斷連線**按鈕和控制項已中斷連接。Click the **Disconnect** button, and the controls are disconnected. 接下來，使用**連接 web 組件控制項**按鈕來重新建立兩個控制項之間的連接。Next, use the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to recreate a connection between the two controls. 按一下**取用者詳細資料**按鈕執行的程式碼存取屬性值。Click the **Consumer Details** button to run the code that accesses the property value.
