summary.span: 覆寫繼承的 方法，並傳回連接物件的簡短型別名稱。

span.span: Overrides the inherited method and returns a short type name for the connection object.

returns.span: 字串，包含 的簡短 (不完整) 型別名稱。

span.span: A string that contains the short (unqualified) type name of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法使用主要是為了方便起見控制項設計工具。This method is used mostly for convenience by control designers. 可提升如何連線物件會出現在 [設計] 檢視中使用較短的型別名稱，而不是完整限定的類型名稱。It improves how connection objects appear in Design view by using the shorter type name, as opposed to a fully qualified type name. 不過，呼叫此方法會在您的程式碼中的任何時間點您要知道連接物件的型別名稱。However, the method can be called at any point in your code where you want to know the type name of a connection object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法傳回的簡短的型別名稱物件。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to return the short type name of a object. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 來源介面和兩個程式碼控制做為提供者和消費者連接。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 主控制項，並執行程式碼範例的網頁。A Web page to host the controls and run the code example. - 如何執行範例頁面的說明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是介面，並控制在消費者和提供者的原始程式碼。The first part of the code example is the source code for the interface, and the consumer and provider controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 最上方是`Register`指的是兩個動態編譯的程式碼的指示詞控制項。Near the top is a `Register` directive that refers to the source code for the two dynamically compiled controls. 在宣告靜態連接了``頁面上的元素。The static connection is declared within the `` element on the page. `Button1_Click`方法呼叫方法，將寫入標籤的連線類型名稱。The `Button1_Click` method calls the method to write the type name of the connection to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/CS/wpConnectToStringCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartConnection_ToString/VB/wpConnectToStringVB.aspx#1)] 載入瀏覽器中。Load the page in a browser. 已建立靜態連接。The static connection is already created. 在提供者的控制項中，輸入一些文字，並注意的文字會顯示在消費者控制項。Enter some text in the provider control, and note that the text is displayed in the consumer control. 按一下**連接詳細資料**按鈕以執行方法。Click the **Connection Details** button to execute the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transformer As WebPartTransformer

summary.span: 取得 物件，這個物件是用來轉換 Web 組件連接之中兩個不相容連接點的資料。

span.span: Gets a object that is used to transform data between two otherwise incompatible connection points in a Web Parts connection.
A .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件連接中，有兩種方式連接中的提供者和消費者控制項可以在其中連接。In a Web Parts connection, there are two ways in which the provider and consumer controls in the connection can connect. 直接連接到其各自物件和了解這兩個控制項的介面型別。They can connect directly, through their respective objects and an interface type that is understood by both controls. 或者，如果它們是不相容，就可連線，間接使用將從提供者介面執行個體轉換成取用者所了解類型的物件。Or, if they are incompatible, they can connect indirectly, using a object that transforms an interface instance from a provider into a type understood by a consumer. 轉換程式需要連接的一部分時屬性提供的參考物件。When a transformer is needed as part of a connection, the property provides a reference to the object. 您可以新增一個標記的自訂轉換器 （或其中一個提供的 Web 組件控制項集合的轉換） 加入轉換程式的網頁，以宣告方式在標記中連接內``項目。You can add a transformer for a connection declaratively in the markup of a Web page, by adding a tag for a custom transformer (or one of the transformers provided with the Web Parts control set) within the `` element. 您也可以加入轉換程式以程式設計的方式，在您的程式碼中建立它的執行個體，然後呼叫方法控制項來建立連接，並傳遞給它來轉換程式物件，以及其他必要的參數。You can also add a transformer programmatically, creating an instance of it in your code, and calling the method on the control to create the connection, passing to it the transformer object along with the other required parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Transformers As WebPartTransformerCollection

summary.span: 取得 Web 組件控制集內部使用的 物件集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects used internally by the Web Parts control set.
A containing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性永遠不會是用於開發人員。The property is never intended for use by developers. 若要存取與連接相關聯的轉換程式，開發人員應該一律使用屬性。To access the transformer associated with a connection, developers should always use the property. 屬性供內部設定，讓網頁開發人員宣告轉換程式項目內的 Web 組件控制項``網頁標記中的項目。The property is used internally by the Web Parts control set to enable page developers to declare transformer elements within the `` element in the markup of a Web page.
